name: salt and pepper shaker in one
description:
Salt and Pepper in One is a container that unites salt and pepper in one piece. Tilt one end for salt, the other for pepper.

Its soothing form distinguishes itself from conventional salt and pepper shakers â€” it blends with everyday surroundings without the hassle of hiding for special occasions. It makes itself available to us anytime.

name: Wounded Vase
description:
A simple form reminding of love and fragility with unique wounds embedded on the surface.

Warning: Wounds do not refer to the past incidents but present to increase the awareness of one another. They also do not imply emotional weaknesses but unique practices we each experience with love.

handmade
ceramics
